text: Judgment Day (2006) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) for their SmackDown! brand. It took place on May 22, 2005 at the Target Center in Minneapolis, Minnesota. It was the seventh Judgment Day event held by WWE. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Nunzio defeated Akio Singles match 3:29 2 MNM (Joey Mercury and Johnny Nitro) (c) (with Melina) defeated Hardcore Holly and Charlie Haas Tag team match for the WWE Tag Team Championship 8:04 3 Carlito (with Matt Morgan) defeated Big Show Singles match 4:41 4 Paul London (c) defeated Chavo Guerrero Singles match for the WWE Cruiserweight Championship 10:41 5 Booker T defeated Kurt Angle Singles match 14:09 6 Orlando Jordan (c) defeated Heidenreich Singles match for the WWE United States Championship 4:54 7 Rey Mysterio defeated Eddie Guerrero by disqualification Singles match 18:31 8 John Cena (c) defeated John "Bradshaw" Layfield "I Quit" match for the WWE Championship 22:40 ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Judgment Day 2005 website Category:2005 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Minneapolis Category:WWE Judgment Day Category:2005 in the United States Category:History of Minneapolis Category:21st century in Minnesota
title: Judgment Day (2005)
